title: See You Again - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama   Beautiful Female Lead   Co-Workers   Couple Growth   Death of Loved Ones   Determined Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Love Triangles   Modern Day   Past Plays a Big Role   Second Chance   Slow Romance   Time Travel   Unconditional Love   Unrequited Love
author: Sui Hou Zhu   随侯珠
description:
If time gives you another chance to meet your lover ahead of time…….

Shi Jian (Shi can be translated as Time in English) and her husband Ye Jia Cheng were originally a happily married loving couple, making people green with envy. But the two still cannot live to an old age in marital bliss. Unexpectedly, Shi Jian was transported back to when she was 21 years old.

Twenty-one years old is the beginning of youth, the best time of your life. Time let her meet the twenty-five years old Ye Jia Cheng, ahead of time.

At this time her “Mr. Ye” was still handsome and talented. Unfortunately, he did not love her.

“Ye Jia Cheng … I’m really your future wife … really.”

“Impossible, little fox, I am in the Don’t Want to Get Married Group.>
